node.title: Man dies after 'water-related incident' at Cape Palliser
node.description: A man has died following "a water-related incident' at Cape Palliser in South Wairarapa today.
node.content:
["A man has died following "a water-related incident" at Cape Palliser in South Wairarapa today.", "", "
File pic Photo: RNZ/Sally Round
", "Police were alerted just after 9am.", "They are making enquiries in relation to the death on behalf of the coroner.", "So far this week there have been two other deaths and a third person is missing in Canterbury in water-related incidents.", "Police have resumed their search for a swimmer missing in the Waimakariri River.", "The swimmer jumped into the river and did not surface on Wednesday night.", "Police divers, the coast guard and surf lifesavers have all been involved in the search, which will today focus on the riverbanks only.", "A child found unresponsive in the Waltham Swimming Pool in Christchurch on Wednesday was unable to be revived.", "Police located a body believed to be mising kayaker Jack Skellet in Wellington Harbour on Tuesday night."]
